name: Barold
description:
This is the second Steam game by DevonAnimation and first collab of TyberiusInSD and Devon. It includes translations for Spanish and Russian and has two difficulties. Normal mode is the default version for casual gamers and Hard mode includes more challenges, specifically made for "God Gamers."
WHAT TO EXPECT IN THE GAME:
  • Smooth movement
  • Unique 1:1 format
  • Catchy and original soundtrack
  • Cartoony and unique graphics
  • Different armors with different stats
  • Interactive and fair boss fights
  • Hidden passages
  • Hidden Easter Eggs and rooms
  • Weapons
  • Double Jumping
  • ...
